pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Multiload-ng is a modern graphical system monitor. It's a near-complete rewrite of the good old GNOME multiload applet.
It runs on a variety of panels, including XFCE, MATE, LXDE, and others. There is also a system tray version, for panels without plugin support, and a standalone version, with its own window.

use.flag: Install autostart entries for suitable targets
Build plugin with dev-libs/libappindicator (Ubuntu Unity and others)
